alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Keya Paha; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:06AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Cherry, northern Sheridan and northwestern Keya Paha Counties through 245 AM CDT/145 AM MDT/... At 205 AM CDT/105 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakeview to 10 miles north of Gordon. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Valentine, Gordon, Rushville, Hay Springs, Cody, Merriman, Kilgore, Nenzel, White Clay, Norden, Crookston, Clinton, Burton, Eli, Lone Butte, Irwin and Pine Ridge. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 128 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 201. Highway 250 between mile markers 46 and 48. Highway 61 between mile markers 212 and 231. Highway 97 near mile marker 135, and between mile markers 137 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 213 and 222. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 36, and between mile markers 57 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Keya Paha; Sheridan; Western Cherry
